flawed_nl_solution:
On Monday, 1200/3=<<1200/3=400>>400 dollars were made.
On Tuesday, 1200/4=<<1200/4=300>>300 dollars were made.
On Wednesday, 1200-400-300=<<1200-400-300=5000>>5000 dollars were made.
#### 5000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 500, not 5000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
